Back for more, from the Havana Room at Chez Rob, it's Blowin' Smoke #69 with a brand new Cigar of the Day for your herfing pleasure along with some familiar Cretins in spirited conversation.

Get ready for an unbiased review of the La Aroma de Cuba Edicion Especial #5 from Ashton and Pepin Garcia.  While we sacrificed these fine cigars, we also checked out some new listener email including some funny, albeit sad, tales from the Pacific Northwest, heard a response to some serious anti-tobacco forces gathering power out there from an industry leader, and checked out some interesting stories from the internet including a growing trend in a certain kind of cosmetic surgery.  Plus a brand new Minute with Travis.  That alone is worth the download!

All this and much more awaits right here on Blowin' Smoke #69.  So, fire up a pleasure stick and herf along with us.

item.title: Blowin' Smoke #68 : La Aurora Barrel Aged Churchill
item.description:
It's Blowin' Smoke #68 LIVE from the Havana Room @ Chez Rob!

While we smoked one for and prayed for the victims of Hurricane Ike in Texas and the gulf coast, Ike's remnants cranked up the wind machine on us while we herfed a new Cigar of the Day...the La Aurora Barrel Aged Churchill.  Your faithful Council of Cretins offered another honest review for your consideration, and that means a new Cigar Match: Rumble in the Bundle to vote on.  Be sure to vote!

We also chatted up the newly activated Pennsylvania smoking ban, how it could get worse for smokers in California (is that possible?), fly-on-the-wall moments, really expensive scotch...what if it sucks?...and more.  Plus, the Blowin' Smoke Big-Ass Third Birthday Party announcement, a new Minute with Travis and more.

How do we get that much stuff into one show?  It's a herf, baby!  So, check out Blowin' Smoke #68 now and keep those emails coming.

item.title: Blowin' Smoke #67 : Mystery Cigar
item.description:
LIVE from the Havana Room @ Chez Rob, it's Blowin' Smoke #67!

Kyle, Collier and Andrew returned to fill the Council of Cretins chairs while they smoked and reviewed a Mystery Cigar, along with your Freako de Fuma, all in the name of science.  Herf along with us and see if you can guess what the Mystery Cigar is before its unveiling.  No cheating!  A new Cigar of the Day means a new contender in the Cigar Match: Rumble in the Bundle too.  Cast your vote at www.BlowinSmokePodcast.com.

Under the watchful stare of Chief Mourning Wood, we enjoyed listener email, a curling rebuttal, name changes, weird news stories and more.  Keep those emails coming, we love hearing from you!

So, pour yourself a tall one, light-up a fine cigar and click play on Blowin' Smoke #67.  We'll leave an ashtray for ya!

item.title: Blowin' Smoke #66 : Hoyo de Monterrey Excalibur Legend Conquerer
item.description:
LIVE from the hot and humid Havana Room at Chez Rob, it's Blowin' Smoke #66 with a full house of Cretins and a brand new Cigar of the Day...the Hoyo de Monterey Excalibur Legend. This cigar from General was just unveiled at the RTDA...er IPCP...er retail tobacco dealers convention in Las Vegas and the Cretins were happy to take it for a spin.  OK, they'll smoke anything free, but that's beside the point and the point is we do this in the name of science...in the name of national security.  If we don't herf, the terrorists win!

In addition to a new Cigar of the Day, we now have a new Cigar Match: Rumble in the Bundle that needs your vote.  Since cigars go best with conversation, we chatted up listener emails, the Olympics, Canadian pay-per-view and more, plus a Smoke 1-4 for great grandma.  It's all here on Blowin' Smoke #66! Check it out!

item.title: Blowin' Smoke #65 : Oliva Serie V Double Toro
item.description:
LIVE from the Havana Room, along with dueling lawn mowers, at Chez Freako, it's Blowin' Smoke #65!

The Council of Cretins' roundtable was being refinished so Kevin filled our faithful Cretin slot as we herfed the Oliva Serie V Double Toro for the Cigar of the Day.  This cigar is a real beauty and a beast.  See if you agree with our individual reviews and then cast your vote in the new Cigar Match: Rumble in the Bundle where the Oliva Serie V takes on the reigning champion Camacho Triple Maduro.  Oliva is no stranger to the Cigar Match so this should be a real good battle of the cigar bands.  Just go to the BlowinSmokePodcast.com and cast your vote!

While we herfed, we talked about the recent Cigar Bar BQ, eating corn on the cob, interesting stories found online, plus my recent purchase of a "man chair" for the Havana Room.  All that and a lot more right here waiting for you on Blowin' Smoke #65.

So, fire up a pleasure stick, pour a tall cool one and listen in! Keep those emails coming too...we love hearing from you.

item.title: Blowin' Smoke #64 : Mystery Cigar
item.description:
LIVE from the 3rd annual Cigar Bar-BQ at Slippery Rock Cigars, it's Blowin' Smoke #64!

Shame on you for missing this herf! It was an all-day smoker...block party, picnic style in scenic Slippery Rock, PA, where we enjoyed lots of delicious food, cold drinks, many many cigars and a record number of fun, friendly people.  There were special deals in the humidor and a whole lot of prizes given away during our own version of Let's Make a Deal, featuring the sexy SRC girls, Casey and The Boss.

The Council of Cretins herfed a mystery cigar for the Cigar of the Day and that means there is a new contender in the Cigar Match.  Cast your vote online BlowinSmokePodcast.com.  

We read some great listener emails, had a double Smoke 1-4 featuring Cindy Brady, heard a special announcement from your Freako de Fuma, and more.

So, kick back with a fine cigar and an adult beverage and join the herf right here with Blowin' Smoke #64 and all your friends at the 3rd annual Cigar Bar-BQ!  Long ashes!!

item.title: Blowin' Smoke #63 : Cuvee 151 Robusto
item.description:
Recorded LIVE from the Havana Room at Chez Rob, it's Blowin' Smoke #63!

Under the watchful gaze of Chief Mourning Wood, the Council of Cretins and your Freak-O de Fuma herfed the re-tooled and re-released Cuvee 151 Robusto while we talked up aggressive driving vs cost of gas, employees of the state ripping off the system and the Camacho Triple Maduro...new blend or mellows with age?

Plus listener emails and info on a benefit poker run with a Blowin' Smoke connection the day after the Annual Cigar Bar-BQ for you to get in on the weekend of July 18-20. There's a new Cigar Match needing your vote too.

It's all right here on the latest episode of the Blowin' Smoke Podcast #63.  Check it out and keep those emails coming!

item.title: Blowin' Smoke #62 : Don Lino Africa Kifaro
item.description:
LIVE from the Smoker Friendly Cigar eXpress in Wexford, PA, it's Blowin' Smoke #62!

The fine folks at Cigar eXpress invited us down to one of their stores as part of their anniversary celebration where we ordained some new Cretins and herfed the Don Lino Africa Kifaro for the Cigar of the Day.  That means some changes are happening in the new Cigar Match: Rumble in the Bundle...more than you think!

Your Freak-O de Fuma and the Cretins talk about the newly signed into law hypocritical Pennsylvania smoking ban, award our NUB three-pak to a lucky listener and limerick writer and more.  Check it out!

item.title: Blowin' Smoke #61 : Camacho Triple Maduro 60/6
item.description:
After intense rehabilitation following the tenth annual Western Pennsylvania Cigar Crawl, we have once again assembled for the latest installment of the Blowin' Smoke Podcast.  Episode 61 features a new Cigar of the Day...the Camacho Triple Maduro 60/6.  This cigar is a beast with a reputation that precedes it.  Does it live up to that reputation when conquered by the Blowin' Smoke Council of Cretins?

Also, new information on some upcoming special shows, lots of emails from happy Blowin' Smoke listeners, another reported incident of cigar crime and more.  Plus a new Cigar Match: Rumble in the Bundle needing your vote.  Don't make us pull a super-delegate deal on you!  It's all packed inside Blowin' Smoke #61.

So call the neighbors and hide the children the latest Blowin' Smoke Podcast is right here.

item.title: Blowin' Smoke #60 : Savoy Churchill
item.description:
LIVE from the 10th annual Western Pennsylvania Cigar Crawl's Pre-Crawl Herf, it's Blowin' Smoke #60.

Crawl veterans and a record number of crawl newbies gathered for a nightcap following a full day of cigars and friendship in anticipation of a full-bore cigar tour of western Pennsylvania and a little bit of eastern Ohio.  We survived a round of Cigar Box Topics, talked to the reigning Queen of the Newbies about passing the crown...if she actually does, and even read a little poetry.  We also herfed a new Cigar of the Day and that means a brand new "Cigar Match: Rumble in the Bundle" for you to vote on.  Gee, who's the odds-on favorite?

It's all right here on Blowin' Smoke #60.  Light up!

item.title: Blowin' Smoke Episode #059
item.description: It's back to see our good friends at King Beaver Cigars for Blowin' Smoke episode 59 along with the highly anticipated, aggressively hyped brand new NUB cigar for our Cigar-of-the-Day review. We herfed the NUB 464T Cameroon from Oliva...a box pressed torpedo. You might say we were NUBified. Your faithful host and the Council of Cretins also chewed on cigar perceptions, cigar store crime...a new trend?, newlywed fights and more. Plus, your chance to win some NUB cigars. Check it out and give us some feedback or share a cigar story with us...we love email.

item.title: Blowin' Smoke Episode #058
item.description: LIVE from Slippery Rock Cigars in scenic Slippery Rock, PA, Blowin' Smoke Episode 58 took advantage of a beautiful spring day to herf outdoors in the warm sun and refreshing breeze. The Cigar-of-the-Day is the Romeo y Julieta Habana Reserve Corona which means a new Cigar Match contender for you to vote on. There is a chance for you to win a sample pack of the brand new NUB cigars...listen to find out how. Some of our topics of conversation include the coming 3rd annual Cigar Bar-BQ in July, inhaling your favorite adult beverage, sneeze fetishes, what Joe likes and more. Plus listener emails. Check it out! Right here on Blowin' Smoke 58.

item.title: Blowin' Smoke Episode #057
item.description: Recorded LIVE and under heavy sniper fire at King Beaver Cigars in scenic Monaca, PA, our assembled Council of Cretins herf and review the CAO America Monument while discussing a variety of topics including letters from customs, sex with patio furniture, Easter ham and more. Plus an update on the Western Pennsylvania Cigar Crawl set for May 17th.
